content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Watford 2.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Watford 2.
Attempt missed. John Obi Mikel (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Willian.
Substitution, Watford. Adlène Guédioura replaces Troy Deeney.
Attempt blocked. Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Branislav Ivanovic.
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Odion Ighalo (Watford).
Diego Costa (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Diego Costa (Chelsea).
Craig Cathcart (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Troy Deeney (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Odion Ighalo (Watford) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Troy Deeney.
Offside, Watford. Miguel Britos tries a through ball, but Ikechi Anya is caught offside.
Valon Behrami (Watford) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Valon Behrami (Watford).
César Azpilicueta (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
José Holebas (Watford) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by José Holebas (Watford).
Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Penalty missed! Bad penalty by Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot is too high. Oscar should be disappointed.
Penalty conceded by Valon Behrami (Watford) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Chelsea. Eden Hazard draws a foul in the penalty area.
Craig Cathcart (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diego Costa (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Foul by Ben Watson (Watford).
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Chelsea. Eden Hazard replaces Pedro because of an injury.
Substitution, Watford. Ikechi Anya replaces Jurado.
Substitution, Watford. Valon Behrami replaces Almen Abdi.
Attempt missed. Diego Costa (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Oscar.
Foul by Almen Abdi (Watford).
Pedro (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Watford 2. Diego Costa (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Willian with a through ball.
Attempt blocked. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Oscar.
Attempt blocked. Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro.
Own Goal by Gary Cahill, Chelsea.  Chelsea 1, Watford 2.
Attempt missed. Odion Ighalo (Watford) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jurado.
Attempt blocked. Etienne Capoue (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Etienne Capoue (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Foul by John Obi Mikel (Chelsea).
Etienne Capoue (Watford) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Etienne Capoue (Watford) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Diego Costa (Chelsea).
Oscar (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Almen Abdi (Watford).
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Craig Cathcart.
Attempt blocked. Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Miguel Britos.
Craig Cathcart (Watford) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Craig Cathcart (Watford).
Diego Costa (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Branislav Ivanovic.
Second Half begins Chelsea 1, Watford 1.
Substitution, Chelsea. John Obi Mikel replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
First Half ends, Chelsea 1, Watford 1.
Attempt missed. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
